body.name: Blackwood For Men HydroBlast Moisturizing Conditioner - Men's Vegan & Natural for Curly & Coarse Hair - Deep Treatment for Damaged & Dry Hair - Sulfate Free, Paraben Free, & Cruelty Free (7.76 Oz)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Blackwood For Men Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 10 mins
features: REPAIR: Transform your hair with our advanced organic sulfate-free formula from Japan that not only smooths, softens & hydrates but also repairs hair from root to tip. Perfect for those with dry, damaged hair seeking nourishment & restoration.

JAPANESE ROOTED: Our hair conditioner boasts natural Botanical Boosts like Peach Leaf and Pro-Vitamin B5 that condition, hydrate & protect hair, adding elasticity & softness while preventing damage. Experience the power of Nature!

ULTIMATE SOOTHING: Relieve your scalp with the soothing cleansing powers of Aloe Vera & Citric Acid in our mens hair conditioner. These natural ingredients reduce inflammation, stop flaking & alleviate itching, providing comfort to your scalp.

PURE MOISTURE: Designed to provide complete moisture to every strand with Hyaluronic Acid to lock in hydration for long-lasting effect. Ideal for coarse or curly hair, it helps to smooth & soften hair texture for a silky, luscious look with less breakage.

HEALTHY HAIR: Achieve stronger, healthier hair with our conditioner infused with biotin-rich Peach Leaf that stimulates hair growth while preventing breakage, frizz & split ends. This natural ingredient strengthens & conditions hair!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Powered by Nature Botanical Boosts Asian botanicals like Ginseng, Green Tea & Tsubaki Oil help stimulate cell repair & fight damage. Simple Sophistication Subtle & Layered Our signature scents have notes of citrus, green tea & mint, plus cedarwood & amber. Pumped Up Swag Form + Function We highlight Japanese principles of shibui & miyabi (simplicity & elegance) in sleek bottles. Level Up for Less Premium Quality Without Premium Cost Cleaner, classier natural formulas at a better value so more guys get access to healthier grooming. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer for men!
reviews.reviewText: When you look for a mens conditioner, customers usually target three criteria: 1) Does it leave my hair moisturized healthy looking and soft. 2) Does it make me smell manly and not fruity womanly. 3) Is it made with all natural ingredients and minimizing chemicals. Blackwoods hydro blast moisturizer meets all three criteria with flying colors.1. Hair feels extremely smooth soft and has a nice sheen to it after just a couple uses2. Strong natural scent that definitely feels masculine leaning3. If you look at the ingredients label you will be surprised by the natural ingredients in this moisturizer (peach leaf and citric ingredients)This is a strong buy and I would highly recommend this product for men looking for the above three criteria

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good stuff, was very skeptical at first,
reviews.reviewText: I had a problem with dry scalp, flaking, especially in the heat. I was using a Medicated dandruff shampoo that was making it worse. My wife ordered this and I thought it was not what I needed, too damn expensive and was ready to return it. She said ' Try it, you'll like it" and I did , doesn't take much so that is great. Works immediately. No problem with dry scalp anymore and that is saying something. I am looking at buying a larger size now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product- strong scent
reviews.reviewText: Seems good for hair, very strong and lingering scent (sandalwood?). Too much for my liking but product good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Jack Black hair conditioner for the last couple of years, and I’m definitely crossing over to this one. It’s thick and it smells good, but the best thing about it is that it’s a great moisturizer for your hair; far better than JB conditioner, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars By far my favorite conditioner...
reviews.reviewText: it's thick, a tiny bit goes a long way and leaves my hair soft and definitely well conditioned...I don't like most conditioners because they have a girly scent..This conditioner is just as good as any over priced conditioner on the market, and it smells great....enough said...
